dcterms:creator: J. E. Iglesias
E. Konukoglu
D. Zikic
B. Glocker
K. Van Leemput
B. Fischl
dcterms:description: The IXI dataset contains multi-contrast MRI images from healthy subjects, specifically T1-, T2-, and PD-weighted images, used for assessing medical image translation methods.
dcterms:title: IXI Dataset

dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze
A. Jakab
S. Bauer
J. Kalpathy-Cramer
K. Farahani
J. Kirby
dcterms:description: The BRATS dataset includes multi-modal brain MRI images from glioma patients, specifically T1-, T2-, and FLAIR-weighted images, used for segmentation and translation tasks.
dcterms:title: BRATS Dataset

dcterms:creator: T. Nyholm
S. Svensson
S. Andersson
J. Jonsson
M. Sohlin
C. Gustafsson
dcterms:description: The Pelvic MRI-CT dataset contains multi-modal imaging data including T1-, T2-weighted MRI and CT images, used for assessing translation between MRI and CT modalities.
dcterms:title: Pelvic MRI-CT Dataset
